entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
